response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. I believe it would be a great addition to your collection, and I understand its worth to you is around $100. Considering its quality and the value it brings, I am offering it to you for $125. This price reflects its true worth while also allowing me to cover my costs and make a reasonable profit. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.", "product_price": 125}
